Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can clearly show how people communicate over a distance using a string telephone with all necessary components.
The student can draw the device ensuring that it uses sound to communicate, with accurate details such as tight, straight strings.
The student can illustrate both students using the string telephone to send or receive information, showing them actively speaking or listening.
The student can represent the connection between the two phones as a string that allows for sound to travel, clearly depicting the string's path.
The student can label and describe the function of each part of the string telephone in their drawing, such as labeling the string, cups, and explaining the travel of sound.
CANNOT: The student may occasionally miss minor details or have small gaps, such as forgetting to include one minor label on an element, but these do not significantly affect the overall understanding.
